pullRequest.title: [KOGITO-1998] - Deprecate KogitoApp CR
pullRequest.bodyText:
Jira issue : https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-1998
Depends on kiegroup/kogito-operator#479
Many thanks for submitting your Pull Request ❤️!
Please make sure that your PR meets the following requirements:
WARNING! Please make sure you are opening your PR against master branch!

 You have read the contributors guide
 Pull Request title is properly formatted: KOGITO-XYZ Subject
 Pull Request title contains the target branch if not targeting master: [0.9.x] KOGITO-XYZ Subject
 Pull Request contains link to the JIRA issue
 Pull Request contains link to any dependent or related Pull Request
 Pull Request contains description of the issue
 Pull Request does not include fixes for issues other than the main ticket

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,17 +1,23 @@
 apiVersion: app.kiegroup.org/v1alpha1
-kind: KogitoApp
+kind: KogitoBuild
 metadata:
   name: process-quarkus-example
 spec:
-  # uncomment to enable persistence
-  #enablePersistence: true
-  build:
-    # uncomment to enable persistence
-    #envs:
-    #  - name: MAVEN_ARGS_APPEND
-    #    value: "-Ppersistence"
-    gitSource:
-      contextDir: process-quarkus-example
-      uri: 'https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-examples'
-    # set your maven nexus repository to speed up the build time
-    #mavenMirrorURL: 
\ No newline at end of file
+  type: RemoteSource
+  gitSource:
+    contextDir: process-quarkus-example
+    uri: 'https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-examples'
+  # set your maven nexus repository to speed up the build time
+  #mavenMirrorURL:
+---
+apiVersion: app.kiegroup.org/v1alpha1
+kind: KogitoRuntime
+metadata:
+  name: process-quarkus-example
+# uncomment to enable persistence
+#spec:
+#  infinispan:
+#    useKogitoInfra: true
+  #envs:
+  #  - name: MAVEN_ARGS_APPEND
+  #    value: "-Ppersistence"1

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                UseKogitoInfra: true
          
          
            
                useKogitoInfra: true
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,16 +1,23 @@
 apiVersion: app.kiegroup.org/v1alpha1
-kind: KogitoApp
+kind: KogitoBuild
 metadata:
   name: process-kafka-quickstart-quarkus
 spec:
-  enableEvents: true
-  build:
-    #envs:
-    # envs can be used to set variables during build
-    #- name: MY_CUSTOM_ENV
-    #  value: "my value"
-    gitSource:
-      contextDir: process-kafka-quickstart-quarkus
-      uri: 'https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-examples'
-    # set your maven nexus repository to speed up the build time
-    #mavenMirrorURL: 
\ No newline at end of file
+  type: RemoteSource
+  #envs:
+  # envs can be used to set variables during build
+  #- name: MY_CUSTOM_ENV
+  #  value: "my value"
+  gitSource:
+    contextDir: process-kafka-quickstart-quarkus
+    uri: 'https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-examples'
+  # set your maven nexus repository to speed up the build time
+  #mavenMirrorURL:
+---
+apiVersion: app.kiegroup.org/v1alpha1
+kind: KogitoRuntime
+metadata:
+  name: process-kafka-quickstart-quarkus
+spec:
+  kafka:
+    UseKogitoInfra: true

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,17 +1,25 @@
 apiVersion: app.kiegroup.org/v1alpha1
-kind: KogitoApp
+kind: KogitoBuild
 metadata:
   name: process-kafka-quickstart-springboot
 spec:
+  type: RemoteSource
   runtime: springboot
-  enableEvents: true
-  build:
-    #envs:
-    # envs can be used to set variables during build
-    #- name: MY_CUSTOM_ENV
-    #  value: "my value"
-    gitSource:
-      contextDir: process-kafka-quickstart-springboot
-      uri: 'https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-examples'
-    # set your maven nexus repository to speed up the build time
-    #mavenMirrorURL: 
\ No newline at end of file
+  #envs:
+  # envs can be used to set variables during build
+  #- name: MY_CUSTOM_ENV
+  #  value: "my value"
+  gitSource:
+    contextDir: process-kafka-quickstart-springboot
+    uri: 'https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-examples'
+  # set your maven nexus repository to speed up the build time
+  #mavenMirrorURL:
+---
+apiVersion: app.kiegroup.org/v1alpha1
+kind: KogitoRuntime
+metadata:
+  name: process-kafka-quickstart-springboot
+spec:
+  runtime: springboot
+  kafka:
+    UseKogitoInfra: true

   name: serverless-workflow-events-quarkus
 spec:

-  build:

-    # envs can be used to set variables during build
-    #- name: MY_CUSTOM_ENV
-    #  value: "my value"
-    gitSource:

-      uri: 'https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-examples'
-    # set your maven nexus repository to speed up the build time
